squidpony.squidtext.nolithiusgen

Class WeightedLetterGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • squidpony.squidtext.nolithiusgen.WeightedLetterGroup

  • @Beta
public class WeightedLetterGroup
extends java.lang.Object
    Keeps track of what letter occurs after some other letter. Based on work by Nolithius available at the following two sites https://github.com/Nolithius/weighted-letter-namegen http://code.google.com/p/weighted-letter-namegen/
    Author:
    Eben Howard - http://squidpony.com - howard@squidpony.com
